title: Model Editor: Joints not properly placed when parts have been manipulated

content.raw:
1. Enter Model Editor and insert two parts

2. Move at least one of them

3. Create a joint whose child part has been moved

4. Click `Done` and then save  the model. It shows up in the scene, but if we look at the joint, it is placed with respect to the part's original pose, not the pose after being moved.

![joint.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3069952935-joint.png)

I believe this is happening because what was moved was the visual within the link (part?), not the link itself. The link remains where it was originally inserted.
